content: this gorgeous papillon infinity scarf has a light and airy feel with a beautiful stitch pattern this pattern is one of the april contributions to the 2025 scarf of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 227 yds of a category 3 light weight yarn i used hobbii sunbird in the papillon 03 colorway * size h 5mm furls streamline crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
